name: green-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder's Smartness during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder's Smartness while in a contest.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:

raises SMART in
CONTESTS.

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It boosts the holding POKéMON’s
SMART condition in CONTESTS.
